events.name: Code
events.description: Ramp up your front end skills. They can only get better. Speakers drop knowledge, you leave inspired. It’s that simple. Revel in the live code examples and thoughtful conversations.

events.name: Connect
events.description: Network with like-minded professionals in the industry. Leverage Fore_Front’s inclusive atmosphere to build friendships, partnerships, and mentorships.

events.name: Caffeinate
events.description: But first and foremost, coffee. You bring the enthusiasm, we’ll provide caffeine (and bagels... So. Many. Bagels).

events.name: Everyone's Internet: Web Accessibility Panel
events.speaker: You!
events.description:
Web accessibility is all of our responsibility. And it's a big role. How do we convince our bosses and clients to invest in accessibility? How do we work together across teams to build a better experience?

In our kickoff event, we'll hear from a panel of industry experts on web accessibility best practices, the role of design and development, cultural transformations, and more! Come with an appetite to learn, we'll provide bagels, coffee, and fresh fruit.
